name: NSTextViewportLayoutController
desc: Manages the layout process inside the viewport interacting with its delegate.

items.name: init(textLayoutManager: NSTextLayoutManager)
items.desc: Creates a new instance with the text layout manager you provide.

items.name: var textLayoutManager: NSTextLayoutManager?
items.desc: Returns the text layout manager for this viewport layout controller.

items.name: var delegate: NSTextViewportLayoutControllerDelegate?
items.desc: The delegate for the text layout manager object.

items.name: protocol NSTextViewportLayoutControllerDelegate
items.desc: Optional methods that delegates implement to reposond to viewport layout changes.

items.name: var viewportBounds: CGRect
items.desc: Returns the visible bounds of the view, plus the overdraw area.

items.name: var viewportRange: NSTextRange?
items.desc: Returns the text range of the current viewport layout.

items.name: func adjustViewport(byVerticalOffset: CGFloat)
items.desc: Adjusts the viewport rect by the specified offset if needed.

items.name: func relocateViewport(to: NSTextLocation) -> CGFloat
items.desc: Relocates the viewport to the location you specify.
